items.sentence: Tom and Mary smiled knowingly at each other.
Tom wasn't invited to Mary's birthday party.
Everyone thought that was an excellent idea.
Canola oil has fewer trans fats than butter.
Pain over the hip joint could mean bursitis.
Please give me a Band-Aid and some medicine.
The death penalty was struck down last year.
Since it was very hot, the chocolate melted.
I'm going to buy a few more bottles of beer.
What is the leading cause of climate change?
Tom didn't call to let me know he'd be late.
The girl over there is the most intelligent.
You and I have things we need to talk about.
Do you know anything about computer science?
That's something we must avoid at all costs.
It seems that Tom wants to become a teacher.
How much homework do you have to do tonight?
You didn't tell me Tom was moving to Boston.
I don't think Tom will like the soup I made.
I don't think Tom will be home this evening.
